siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Incremental gains
frontmatter.description: Big gains feel unlikely in the current environment. String together small incremental gains for happiness and effectiveness. Incremental gains eventually lead to step change.

frontmatter.title: Create projects too good to ignore
frontmatter.description: Make better things. Do better work. Demonstrate the possibilities.

frontmatter.title: Keep conversations moving
frontmatter.description: Move discussion forward. Make others aware of next steps. It's much harder to start a cold conversation than to keep a warm one going.

frontmatter.title: Time does not wait for perfect conditions
frontmatter.description: Keep going. Time does not wait for perfect conditions. Even small progress is better than standing still.
